content:
I do not have personal opinions and preferences, but i can provide you with more information about the reasons why the show ended in 2013.

there were various reasons why before the game ended in 2013. one of the main reasons was due to changes in the network's sports coverage, which saw the afl broadcasting rights shift from channel ten to rival network seven. this change resulted in the network losing a significant part of its sports programming, which made it difficult to sustain before the game.

in addition, the show's hosts were also looking to explore new opportunities, with fitzgerald moving to sydney to pursue radio and television opportunities, lehmann taking a role with cricket victoria, and maher continuing his career in sports journalism.

overall, the show was a popular and entertaining addition to the friday night afl coverage, but ultimately, changes in the network's programming and the hosts' personal career goals led to its cancellation.
